Go to google drive within your email.
Add a description: Dear students, we are creating a new app to make sports recruitment easier. Please give us five minutes of your time to help make this app as effective as possible!.
Then begin entering your questions with the response format i.e. multiple choice questions, short answer or paragraph, checkboxes (to select many options), dropdown menu.
You can also add images to any question by selecting the option to add “inline image” next to the question.
